channel.title: Emulator section
channel.description: We should make a section for emulators. Downloading emulators, creating emulators, help w/ emulators. Just a suggestion. Discuss.

item.title: Emulator section
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

yea we should make a global board for everything, fuck forum topics, i mean that isn’t what a forum is for or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Emulator section
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:37, topic:267942”][quote author=Niall link=topic=353723.msg2711239#msg2711239 date=1237322740]
Requesting boards is worse than giving users custom titles, give one or two out then everyone wants one…
[/quote]

Exactly, which is why I am always very hesitant of both.

I don’t quite understand what would be in this board.

Discussions about existing emulators? What would be the use in that?
Creation of new emulators? Post it in the programming section.
Discussion of roms? Go somewhere else.

What else would there be?[/quote]
using that basis alot of boards could probably be removed in preference of other boards. But putting them all together is better

Read full topic

item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

What else would there be?

la­wl:

item.description:

Emulators are for games, and there already is a game board.

A emulator is not a game, for homebrew games section is good, but General Programming can be used to emulator programming.

item.title: Emulator section
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:20, topic:267942”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=353723.msg2711082#msg2711082 date=1237318551]

there is a hardware section have you not noticed it?

dumb shit… Not a computer hardware… Just general “hardware” eg mods to things, things people have built…

'sif your post explained that, besides anything that is hardware is likely to be computerised in some way

In a hardware shop store they sell hammers etc…

so then he wants a board about god damn hammers?
[/quote]

No, but you said that hardware is computerized, which obviously isn’t always the case. If you know bootnecklad just a tad bit, you know he is interested in modding/creating anything electronic. I doubt his relay computer fits into the computer hardware section.

And bootnecklad, the store was just to point out that hardware isn’t limited to computers :D[/quote]
This is true!

I <3 you so much R.I.P RSC !!!

<3 to as much as my soldering iron!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Emulator section

i said likely not always

there is a hardware section have you not noticed it?

dumb shit… Not a computer hardware… Just general “hardware” eg mods to things, things people have built…

'sif your post explained that, besides anything that is hardware is likely to be computerised in some way

In a hardware shop store they sell hammers etc…
[/quote]
so then he wants a board about god damn hammers?[/quote]

No, but you said that hardware is computerized, which obviously isn’t always the case. If you know bootnecklad just a tad bit, you know he is interested in modding/creating anything electronic. I doubt his relay computer fits into the computer hardware section.
